recipe: Rich chocolate cake with a gooey molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

recipe: Creamy cheesecake on a graham cracker crust, served with strawberry sauce.

recipe: Spiced carrot cake with walnuts, layered and topped with cream cheese frosting.

recipe: Classic red velvet cake with a light cocoa flavor, layered with cream cheese frosting.

recipe: Moist lemon-infused sponge cake with a sweet-tart lemon glaze.

recipe: Layers of coffee-soaked sponge cake, mascarpone cheese, and dusted with cocoa powder.

recipe: Chocolate sponge cake with cherries, whipped cream, and shaved chocolate.

recipe: Moist pumpkin cake with spices, layered with cream cheese frosting and topped with pecans.

recipe: Moist banana bread transformed into a cake, topped with cream cheese frosting and walnuts.

name: Vanilla Berry Layer Cake
